about_me_description: I am a Full Stack Software Engineer with a passion for creating innovative solutions.
I have experience in various technologies and frameworks, and I am always eager to learn new skills.
My goal is to build efficient and scalable applications that solve real-world problems.
education_description: Technical Degree in Computer Science from the Federal Institute of Education, Science and Technology of São Paulo (IFSP), 2016.
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering from the Saint Francis University (USF), 2022.
MBA in Project Management from the University of São Paulo (USP), 2023.
experience_description: Encora Inc. - Technical Lead (June 2024 - Present) | Software Developer Specialist (July 2021 - Present) - Working on various client projects primarily based in the USA, with scopes including cloud communication, facilities, etc. Technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React, Node.js, AWS, MongoDB, PostgreSQL.

SONDA - Full Stack Developer (April 2018 - July 2021) - Developed web applications using Angular, Node.js, Java. Worked with Oracle, MongoDB databases. Applied Scrum methodology and project management following PMI standards.

SONDA - Project Manager (October 2015 - April 2018) - Requirements analysis, scope management, functional detailing for customization, activity planning, process monitoring and control. Applied PMBOK knowledge areas and PMI best practices using CMMI level III documentation process.

SONDA - Analyst (April 2015 - October 2017) - Project manager for Road Maps and client projects in Mobility sector. Requirements gathering, scope definition, project planning, prototype development, test execution, and project closure following CMMI quality certification.

Escritório Contábil Leme S/C Ltda - Administrative Office Assistant (February 2013 - January 2014) - Assisted Fiscal, Accounting, Legal, HR departments. Controlled entries/exits and service provision for companies under ME, Simples Nacional and Lucro Presumido regimes.
